div.p: This project allows to open and work with maven projects in the Netbeans IDE. Mevenide currently supports NetBeans 3.6 and 4.0dev.
Mevenide for the upcoming 4.0 version contains these features .

You can download the 0.3 release. It was tested with Maven 1.0 and Netbeans Beta2. Reasonable effort is made to have it always working with the latest development builds of Netbeans 4.0. Please note that the grammar module (completion for maven xml files) for 0.3 release will work with beta2 but not with current dev builds. Please download this version that works with Netbeans post-beta2 dev builds. To get the latest Netbeans beta and dev builds, go to the download page
You can download the snapshot release of Mevenide for Netbeans 3.x.
NOTE: Development of Mevenide for NetBeans 3.6 has been stoppped and the downloaded codebase is not production ready. Further development is going on for NB 4.0.
